SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, rownum AS rnum FROM (SELECT seq, cust_name, CUST_PHONE, CONT_TERM, OPEN_DATE, MEMO, WRITE_DATE, WRITE_IP, BRC_ID, PRICE_NAME, MODEL_CODE, REBATE, to_char(CUST_BIRTH, 'YYYY-DD-MM') AS CUST_BIRTH FROM CUSTOMINFO) A) B
WHERE #startNum# <= rnum AND rnum <= #endNum# ORDER BY rnum ASC

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, rownum AS rnum FROM (SELECT seq, cust_name, CUST_PHONE, CONT_TERM, OPEN_DATE, MEMO, WRITE_DATE, WRITE_IP, BRC_ID, PRICE_NAME, MODEL_CODE, REBATE, to_char(CUST_BIRTH, 'YYYY-DD-MM') AS CUST_BIRTH FROM CUSTOMINFO WHERE BRC_ID=#salesID#) A) B

MODEL_CODE AND C.seq=#seq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO custominfo(seq, cust_name, cust_phone, cust_birth, cont_term, open_date, memo, brc_id, price_name, model_code, rebate, write_ip) VALUES (custom_seq.nextval, #cust_name#, #cust_phone#, #cust_birth#, #cont_term#, #open_date#, #memo#, #brc_id#, #price_name#, #model_code#, #rebate#, #write_ip#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CUSTOMINFO SET CUST_NAME=#cust_name#, CUST_PHONE=#cust_phone#, CONT_TERM=#cont_term#, MEMO=#memo#, BRC_ID=#brc_id#, PRICE_NAME=#price_name#, MODEL_CODE=#model_code#, REBATE=#rebate#, CUST_BIRTH=#cust_birth# WHERE SEQ = #seq#
